summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3406 for the improvement of King Street, from a point one hundred thirty-six (136) feet west of the west line of 8th Avenue South to 12th Avenue South all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42226, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
